name: rngone0
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c2, cgr))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c2, cgr))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgr), wne(c1, emptycls))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ RingOps → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ RingOps → c2 ∈ GrpOp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ GrpOp → c1 ≠ ∅)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c2, cgr))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgr), wne(c1, emptycls))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ RingOps → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ RingOps → c2 ∈ GrpOp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ GrpOp → c1 ≠ ∅)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c2, cgr))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(c1st, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgr), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(c1st, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ RingOps → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ (c2 ∈ GrpOp → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ c2 =(1st ` c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, cgr), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wceq(c1, crn(c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, emptycls))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(c1st, c0))
-| wceq(c1, crn(c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ RingOps → c1 ≠ ∅)
⊣ c2 =(1st ` c0)
⊣ c1 = ran(c2)

comment: The base set of a ring is not empty. (Contributed by FL, 24-Jan-2010.) (New usage is discouraged.)
